footer.description: VisuScan is an AI-powered web application for image analysis. It allows users to upload and analyze images.

hero.title: Scan Your Images
hero.description: Upload your images and let VisuScan analyze them for you with cutting-edge AI technology

aiGeneration.title: Discover the Invisible with Artificial Intelligence
aiGeneration.description: We analyze the finest details, objects, and text in your images in seconds using Google Gemini infrastructure.

features.title: Detailed Object Recognition
features.text: It detects and lists all objects, brands, and text in the image with 99% accuracy.

features.title: Security Filters
features.text: Automatically checks whether images comply with general morality or workplace rules.

features.title: Rapid Integration
features.text: Get your analysis results in JSON format and integrate them into your database or application immediately.

items.question: What is VisuScan?
items.answer: VisuScan is an AI-powered web application that allows users to upload and analyze images.

items.question: Which file formats do you support?
items.answer: We support common image file formats such as JPG, PNG, WEBP, and HEIC.

items.question: Are the images I uploaded safe?
items.answer: Yes, user privacy is important to us. All uploaded images are stored on our secure servers and are not shared with third parties.

items.question: Is this service paid?
items.answer: VisuScan is currently in Beta. It is completely free.

quickResult.title: Get Results in Seconds
quickResult.description: No complicated procedures are needed. Just drag and drop, and let artificial intelligence handle the rest. Designed to speed up your workflow.

steps.title: Upload Image
steps.desc: Drag and drop your PNG, JPG, or WebP file.

steps.title: Artificial Intelligence Analysis
steps.desc: The Gemini engine scans and interprets the image pixel by pixel.

steps.title: Download the Result
steps.desc: Copy the structured data or save it to your project file.

showInput.title: Start Visual Analysis
showInput.description: Upload the image you want to analyze below.

features.title: Easy Upload
features.text: Drag and drop your image or select from your files. We support PNG, JPG formats.

features.title: AI-Powered Analysis
features.text: Our advanced AI model analyzes the image in seconds and extracts details.

features.title: Safe and Fast
features.text: Your data is processed securely. Results are displayed on your screen instantly.

about.title: Making the Invisible Visible
about.description: VisuScan leverages AI-powered image analysis technologies to make sense of visual data in the digital world.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To enable everyone to quickly, accurately, and meaningfully gain insights from visual data using the latest AI technologies. Simplifying complex analysis processes to save time and resources.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To set a global standard in image processing. To be a leading platform that optimizes business processes, enhances security, and opens doors to new discoveries with our technology.

potential.title: Ready to Unlock the Potential of Your Images?
potential.description: Try VisuScan for free now and experience the power of AI in your own projects.
